newsitem.title: BULGARIA: EU to help Bulgaria fight pollution.
newsitem.headline: EU to help Bulgaria fight pollution.

text.p: Bulgaria signed a framework agreement with the European Union's Phare cooperation programme on Tuesday for funding of environmental protection projects, officials said.

"The ministry has received a total of 29.7 million Ecus under all four financial memorandums from 1990 until 1994 and has successfully managed projects financed by the EU's Phare programme," Environment Minister Georgi Georgiev said at the signing.
The EU funds have helped Bulgaria carry out investment projects, including reduction of environmental pollution in worst-affected "hot spots."
Bulgaria expects to receive an EU grant of 3.25 million Ecus for various environmental projects in 1997.
